alert.note: Alert for Dubuque; Jackson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 11:34AM CDT until April 19 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN JO DAVIESS...NORTH CENTRAL JACKSON AND SOUTHEASTERN DUBUQUE COUNTIES... At 1133 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Mines of Spain to near Dubuque Regional Airport, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... East Dubuque around 1140 AM CDT. St. Donatus and Massey around 1145 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
